Docs.summary: Specifies whether the tabs in a tab control are owner-drawn (drawn by the parent window), or drawn by the operating system.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by members such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> class and its derived classes support owner-draw functionality, but only one type, in which you can draw the tabs individually.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode Normal = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The tabs are drawn by the operating system, and are of the same size.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode OwnerDrawFixed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The tabs are drawn by the parent window, and are of the same size.
